title: The Day I Loved You
overview: Eli is in trouble at school, as punishment he is asked to take part in the preparations for the upcoming school prom under the care of Nikko. The two have nothing in common and are at each other's throats constantly. But things take a turn when they share a dance and Eli feels his heart skip a beat. Their budding romance is further complicated by Justin, Nikko's best friend, who seems to have more than platonic feelings for Nikko.
